response: I can help you explore various career paths and internships! You can also use the Career Explorer tool in the sidebar for a detailed view.
For most programs like Computer Science, graduation requires 120 credits total, including 45 upper-level credits and a minimum 2.0 GPA. Check the 'Policies' tab in Academic Guidance for details!
Prerequisites vary by course. You can check your eligibility in the 'Prerequisites' tab of the Academic Guidance module. It will flag any missing requirements!
I can definitely show you a roadmap! Head over to the 'Roadmap' tab in Academic Guidance to see your semester-by-semester plan.
You can estimate your semester GPA using our GPA Calculator! It's located under the 'GPA' tab in Academic Guidance.
To start learning Python, I recommend the 'Python for Everybody' series in the Learning Hub. It's perfect for beginners!
You can toggle Dark Mode and manage other preferences in the 'Preferences' section. Just click your avatar to find it!
You can view and edit your profile details in the 'User Profile' section. Click your avatar to access it.
